name: Project: Tank Drone
description:
***STILL A PROTOTYPE***

Background story:

You are dispatched to eliminate a bunch of alien bugs in a distant place, until one day, Command Center gave you a call and told you that the bugs attacked the main base and they need you back there for support. On the way there, you find yourself facing against more alien bugs.

Will you reach the base in time?

***PROJECT DETAILS***

The game/project is supposed to be an entry for GMTK 2021 game jam but I did't finish the prototype in time because of time constraints and other reasons. But here it is!

***GAME DETAILS***

How is it played? It is best played with a friend/child/brother/sister/partner, one controls the mouse, and keyboard for the other (WASD controls). But you can also play it alone, if you're also a solo player ( or just alone *tears*)

No audio? yes, because I still haven't learned how to make music yet, or should I say, I couldn't think of music that would fit the theme. It will come, maybe. LOL

Yes it is free, but you can donate. I plan on making 5 levels for this game (maybe 10, if people would be interested in the game.) My pc couldn't handle the development and I couldn't keep on working on this game for long time if nobody would play it, could I?
